document.docAuthor: Chani-Posse, Mariana, Newton, Alfred F., Hansen, Aslak Kappel & Solodovnikov, Alexey
document.masterDocTitle: Checklist and taxonomic changes for Central and South American Philonthina (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist and taxonomic changes for Central and South American Philonthina (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae)

bibRefCitation.refString: Sharp, D. (1885) Staphylinidae. Biologia Centrali-Americana. Insecta. Coleoptera, 1 (2), 393 - 536. [http: // www. sil. si. edu / digitalcollections / bca /]

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Chroaptomus
Sharp 1885 : 437
. Type species:
Philonthus flagrans Erichson, 1840
, designated by
Lucas 1920 : 184
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Notes:
Chroaptomus
is an endemic Neotropical genus with five valid species known at present, distributed from
Mexico
to northern Argentina , through
Guatemala
, Honduras , Nicaragua ,
Costa Rica
,
Panama
, Colombia , Venezuela ,
Ecuador
, Peru , Bolivia and Brazil ( Chani-Posse 2006 ). The genus has been recently revised (Chani- Posse 2006 ) and its monophyly confirmed (
Chani-Posse et al. 2018
).

bibRefCitation.refString: Chani-Posse, M. (2006) Systematic revision and cladistic analysis of the Neotropical genus Chroaptomus Sharp (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae), with descriptions of two new species. Insect Systematics & Evolution, 37, 361 - 383. https: // doi. org / 10.1163 / 187631206788831452

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Chroaptomus centralis
Chani-Posse 2006 : 373
. Type locality: Honduras : Olancho : La Unión, Parque Nac. La Muralla. Type depository: FMNH HT ♂ , etc. Distribution:
Mexico
,
Guatemala
, Honduras , Colombia , Venezuela .

Philonthus coelites
Erichson 1840 : 440
. Type locality: Brasilia. Type depository: ZMHB LT. Distribution: Brazil (Bahia, Paraná, Pernambuco, Rio de Janeiro, Santa Catarina, São Paulo). Notes: comb. nov. ex
Philonthus
(
Scheerpeltz, 1933 : 1376
, as var. of
flagrans
); lectotype designation, redescription and distribution (Chani-
Posse 2006 : 373
); distribution within Brazil (Asenjo et al. 2013).

Philonthus flagrans
Erichson 1840 : 441
. Type locality: Columbia. Type depository: ZMHB LT ♂ , 3 PLT . Distribution:
Mexico
, Honduras , Nicaragua ,
Costa Rica
,
Panama
, Colombia , Venezuela ,
Ecuador
, Peru , Bolivia , Brazil , Argentina . Notes: comb. nov. ex
Philonthus (
Sharp 1885: 437
)
; Peru ( Asenjo 2004 ); lectotype designation, redescription and distribution (
Chani-Posse 2006: 370
); distribution, also within
Mexico
(
Navarrete-Heredia et al. 2002
, Márquez 2006 ).

bibRefCitation.refString: Chani-Posse, M. (2006) Systematic revision and cladistic analysis of the Neotropical genus Chroaptomus Sharp (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae), with descriptions of two new species. Insect Systematics & Evolution, 37, 361 - 383. https: // doi. org / 10.1163 / 187631206788831452

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Chroaptomus mexicanus Chani-Posse & Navarrete-Heredia in
Chani-Posse 2006 : 376
. Type locality: Jalisco , Tequila ,
Volcán de Tequila
,
2500m
.
Type depository: CZUG HT, etc. Distribution : Mexico
.

bibRefCitation.refString: Sharp, D. (1885) Staphylinidae. Biologia Centrali-Americana. Insecta. Coleoptera, 1 (2), 393 - 536. [http: // www. sil. si. edu / digitalcollections / bca /]

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Chroaptomus regalis
Sharp 1885 : 438
. Type locality: Bugaba,
Panama
. Type depository: BMNH LT, FMNH 3 PLT . Distribution:
Costa Rica
,
Panama
. Note: lectotype designated by Chani-
Posse (2006: 375)
.

bibRefCitation.refString: Chani-Posse, M. & Couturier, G. (2012) Delgadobius amazonensis - a new genus and species of the subtribe Philonthina from Amazonia (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Staphylininae). Zootaxa, 3568, 81 - 88.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Delgadobius
Chani-Posse & Couturier 2012 : 82
. Type species:
Delgadobius amazonensis Chani-Posse & Couturier, 2012
, by original designation.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Note:
Delgadobius
is an endemic Neotropical genus with a single species recorded so far.

bibRefCitation.refString: Chani-Posse, M. & Couturier, G. (2012) Delgadobius amazonensis - a new genus and species of the subtribe Philonthina from Amazonia (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Staphylininae). Zootaxa, 3568, 81 - 88.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Delgadobius amazonensis
Chani-Posse & Couturier 2012 : 84
. Type locality: Peru : Loreto : Iquitos Nauta road, km 46, 04° 02'S 73° 24'W . Type depository:
MNHN
HT ♂ ; FMNH 4PT, etc. Distribution: Brazil , Peru . Notes: in male inflorescences of palms
Mauritia
,
Oenocarpus
,
Euterpe
spp ( Arecaceae ) ( Chani-Posse & Couturier 2012 ); not in Asenjo et al. 2013.
